column4: Microsoft warns Windows PCs also vulnerable to 'Freak' attacks
column5: BOSTON Hundreds of millions of Windows PC users are vulnerable to attacks exploiting the recently uncovered "Freak" security vulnerability  which was initially believed to only threaten mobile devices and Mac computers  Microsoft Corp warned.

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft warns Windows PCs also vulnerable to 'Freak' attacks
column5: BOSTON  March 6 Hundreds of millions of Windows PC users are vulnerable to attacks exploiting the recently uncovered "Freak" security vulnerability  which was initially believed to only threaten mobile devices and Mac computers  Microsoft Corp warned.

column4: Tesla says Nevada battery plant on track despite report of delay
column5: DETROIT Tesla Motor Inc said on Friday that construction of its giant $5 billion battery plant in Nevada remains on schedule despite a newspaper report saying the electric carmaker's project was delayed.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla says Nevada battery plant on track despite report of delay
column5: DETROIT  March 6 Tesla Motor Inc said on Friday that construction of its giant $5 billion battery plant in Nevada remains on schedule despite a newspaper report saying the electric carmaker's project was delayed.

column4: Construction of Tesla battery plant in Nevada delayed - report
column5: DETROIT  March 6 Construction has been delayed for Tesla Motors Inc's giant $5 billion battery plant in Nevada  the Reno Gazette-Journal reported on Friday  citing a couple of union job postings.
